document_data.name: ''Blindglyph''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''blindglyph''''' was a powerful [[handglyph]] weapon favored by the [[Geomancer]]s of [[Kadar]] used to blind their enemies.
document_data.Powers:
A ''blindglyph'' stored the power of the ''[[power word, blind]]'' [[spell]], unleashing it at an enemy when presented and the proper [[command word]] was uttered.

These handglyphs could not be recharged.
